value: For this assignment the goal is to get familiar with C# by translating a simple Java console app. No new git commands today, just reinforcing the ones learned over the past weeks. I am getting started by creating empty class files for each of the classes I need to translate.
With those created, its time to fill them out in the recommended order. Another montage?
With those done it is time to test the console app. Pretty straight forward.
Hey it works! With that done I am going to wrap up by merging my feature branch in and tidying up this post. Of course I built this using last weeks homework assignment again!

A very simple assignment today. There are some things I should add to my builder to make this easier and look a bit nicer. The only thing I forgot I needed to do was put <T> at the top of my LinkedQueue.cs class. See you next week.
